channel.description: Weekly BlackBerry headline roundup, from the most popular news sites around, with a little bit of fun, courtesy of the FuMP.com. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: QuickBerry Episode 17
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
The SuperAbuser is back! After a forced hiatus (I switched trucking companies, which limited my ability to carry my podcast rig) its time for another QuickBerry! Lots of great news this week, and a new headline source, BlackBerryCool.com, makes its QuickBerry debut.
The Great Luke Ski - House Party at Arkham Asylum
Beefy - Nerdcore for life
Dual Core - KickBack
Insane Ian - House
item.itunes:author: BBSuperAbuser
item.itunes:subtitle: QuickBerry Episode 17

item.title: QuickBerry Episode 16
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Lots of great news in this weeks episode, Trapster makes it's return to Appworld, BlackBerry is the most searched term in the UK over iPhone, and more!
The prices suck at Whole Foods - Project Sisyphus
Blow Me Down - Moneyshot Cosmonauts
Five For Two - Bob Ricci
How To Speak ShoEboX - Cirque du So What

item.title: QuickBerry Episode 13
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
BlackBerry Empire makes its debut as a news source, the QuickBerry Podcast hotline goes live, and lots more!
Everybody should play V:TES 'cause somebody's gotta be worse than me - The Gothcicles
Ten foot 2, Skin of blue - Robert Lund and Spaff.com
God hates comedy musicians - Cirque Du So What
Hookin for drugs (in all the wrong places) - Moneyshot Cosmonauts

item.description:

item.title: EPISODE 7 - QuickBerry
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Lots of fantastic news, including the first two nominees for Editorial and the first nominee for How-to for the QuickBerry Podcast BlackBerry Blog Awards!
Worm Quartet - The Laundromat of Sin Project Sisyphus - Take My Job Away Koby LaCroix - Look Directly at the Floating Polystyrene Head Steve Goodie - You Rich MotherFuckers

item.title: QuickBerry Marscon Promo
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Marscon is coming up quick, and the Marscon Dementia track this year is featuring some stellar Dementia artists. Here's the skinny on this years Marscon Dementia track.
